abstract: Despite a lackluster day, the Dow Jones industrial average and the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index rose more than 5 percent in November.
snippet: Despite a lackluster day, the Dow Jones industrial average and the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index rose more than 5 percent in November.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street spent Monday trading in a narrow range, but managed to push higher at the close.

headline.main: Markets Rise, With Spending and Dubai Weighing In
